quotes.text: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
quotes.author: Phrynette Married

quotes.text: Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time,' is like saying, 'I don't want to.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: You may delay, but time will not.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: There's never enough time to do all the nothing you want.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: Time is a game played beautifully by children.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: Time is what we want most,but what we use worst.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.text: The future is uncertain but the end is always near.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.text: Time takes it all, whether you want it to or not.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: Time is what keeps everything from happening at once.
quotes.author: Ray Cummings

quotes.text: The strongest of all warriors are these two — Time and Patience.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: Time can be a greedy thing-sometimes it steals the details for itself.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.text: There is more to life than simply increasing its speed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: As if you could kill time without injuring eternity.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Three o'clock is always too late or too early for anything you want to do.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.text: Lost Time is never found again.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Never waste a minute thinking about people you don't like.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: The future came and went in the mildly discouraging way that futures do.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: The past is a ghost, the future a dream and all we ever have is now.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.text: Time spent with a cat is never wasted.
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.text: Time is precious, but truth is more precious than time.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.text: Clocks slay time... time is dead as long as it is being clicked off by little wheels; only when the clock stops does time come to life.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.text: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: Inelegantly, and without my consent, time passed.
quotes.author: Miranda July

quotes.text: There's no advantage to hurrying through life.
quotes.author: Masashi Kishimoto

quotes.text: Five minutes are enough to dream a whole life, that is how relative time is.
quotes.author: Mario Benedetti

quotes.text: The wisest are the most annoyed at the loss of time.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.text: Time's the thief of memory
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: Eternity is in love with the productions of time.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: It's such a shame to waste time. We always think we have so much of it.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.text: Time will explain.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.text: Time is the most valuable thing that a man can spend.
quotes.author: Diogenes Laërtius

quotes.text: I wasted time, and now doth time waste me.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Time expands, then contracts, all in tune with the stirrings of the heart.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.text: Time is Galleons, little brother.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.text: Any time not spent on love is wasted.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.text: Even a broken clock is right twice a day.
quotes.author: Stephen Hunt

quotes.text: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most; you should change your priorities over time.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: And yet it takes only the smallest pleasure or pain to teach us time’s malleability.
quotes.author: Julian Barnes

quotes.text: The memory of everything is very soon overwhelmed in time.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Do not whine... Do not complain. Work harder. Spend more time alone.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.text: Time moves slowly, but passes quickly.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.text: Clear thinking at the wrong moment can stifle creativity.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.text: Sometimes life is a constant battle against the nostalgia of a time that can never be real again.
quotes.author: Jason Myers

quotes.text: I am not particularly interested in saving time; I prefer to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

quotes.text: The time that leads to mastery is dependent on the intensity of our focus.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.text: An infinity of passion can be contained in one minute, like a crowd in a small space.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.text: You never know ahead of time what something's really going to be like.
quotes.author: Katherine Paterson

quotes.text: Everyone's time is limited. What matters most is to focus on what matters most.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Men talk of killing time, while time quietly kills them.
quotes.author: Dion Boucicault

quotes.text: Time deals gently only with those who take it gently.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: Every moment is the paradox of now or never.
quotes.author: Simon Van Booy

quotes.text: A person that does not value your time will not value your advice.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.text: There is always time for another last minute
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett
